bank_card_id,
lender_id,
bank_card_number,
bank_name,
bank_code,
bank_verfy,

mapper.update:
update lender_bank_card
lender_id = #{lender_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bank_card_number = #{bank_card_number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bank_name = #{bank_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bank_code = #{bank_code,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
bank_verfy = #{bank_verfy,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where bank_card_id = #{bank_card_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update lender_bank_card set lender_id = #{lender_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bank_card_number = #{bank_card_number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_name = #{bank_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_code = #{bank_code,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, bank_verfy = #{bank_verfy,jdbcType=TINYINT} where bank_card_id = #{bank_card_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
